entry.title: [CA][Dedicated Servers] - Network
entry.content:
Nov 15, 22:33 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/11/2022 18:00 UTC
End Time : 15/11/2022 22:30 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 15, 21:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/11/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : We are currently having issues on some services of vrack such as (add/remove vmacs) and to move IP).
Customers have access to their dedicated servers but latency might be observed.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
